public final class RefModeRecord
extends StandardRecord

Title: RefMode Record

Description: Describes which reference mode to use

REFERENCE: PG 376 Microsoft Excel 97 Developer's Kit (ISBN: 1-57231-498-2)

Version:
2.0-pre
Author:
Andrew C. Oliver (acoliver at apache dot org), Jason Height (jheight at chariot dot net dot au)

serialize

public void serialize(LittleEndianOutput out)
Description copied from class: StandardRecord
Write the data content of this BIFF record. The 'ushort sid' and 'ushort size' header fields have already been written by the superclass.
The number of bytes written must equal the record size reported by RecordBase.getRecordSize()} minus four ( record header consiting of a 'ushort sid' and 'ushort reclength' has already been written by thye superclass).

Specified by:
serialize in class StandardRecord
